Verses: 1 avar Dhevaalayaththai Vittup Purappadumpodhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargalil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Idho, Indhakkallugal Eppadippattadhu! Indhak Kattadangal Eppadippattadhu! Paarum Endraan.
2 yesu Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Indhapperiya Kattadangalaik Kaangiraaye, Oru Kallinmel Oru Kalliraadhapadikku Ellaam Idikkappattuppogum Endraar.
3 pinbu, Avar Dhevaalayaththukku Edhiraaga Olivamalaiyin Mel Utkaarndhirukkaiyil, Pedhuruvum Yaakkobum Yovaanum Andhireyaavum Avaridaththil Thaniththu Vandhu:
4 ivaigal Eppozhudhu Sambavikkum? Ivaigalellaam Niraiverungaalaththukku Adaiyaalam Enna? Engalukku Sollavendum Endraargal.
5 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Oruvanum Ungalai Vanjiyaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
6 enenil Anegar Vandhu, En Naamaththaikkondu: Naane Kiristhu Endru Solli, Anegarai Vanjippaargal.
7 yuththangalaiyum Yuththangalin Seydhigalaiyum Kelvippadumpodhu Kalangaadheyungal; Ivaigal Sambavikkavendiyadhe; Aanaalum Mudivu Udane Varaadhu.
8 janaththukku Virodhamaai Janamum, Raajyaththukku Virodhamaai Raajyamum Ezhumbum; Boomiyadhirchchigalum Pala Idangalil Undaagum, Panjangalum Kalagangalum Undaagum; Ivaigal Vedhanaigalukku Aarambam.

9 neengalo Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Enenil Ungalai Aalosanai Sangangalukku Oppukkoduppaargal, Neengal Jebaaalayangalil Adikkappaduveergal; Ennimiththam Dhesaadhipadhigalukkum Adhigaarigalukkum Saatchiyaaga Avargalukku Munbaaga Niruththappaduveergal.
10 sagala Jaadhigalukkum Suvisesham Mundhip Pirasangikkappadavendum.

11 avargal Ungalaik Kondupoi Oppukkodukkumpodhu, Neengal Ennapesuvom Endru Munnadhaagak Kavalaippadaamalum Sindhiyaamalumirungal; Annaazhigaiyile Edhu Ungalukku Arul Seyyappadumo Adhaiye Pesungal; Enenil Pesugiravar Neengalalla Parisuththa Aaviye Pesugiravar.
12 andriyum Sagodharan Sagodharanaiyum, Thagappan Pillaiyaiyum Maranaththukku Oppukkoduppaargal; Petrorukku Virodhamaagap Pillaigal Ezhumbi, Avargalaik Kolaiseyvaargal.
13 en Naamaththinimiththam Ellaaraalum Pagaikkappaduveergal. Mudivubariyandham Nilainirpavane Ratchikkappaduvaan.

14 melum Paazhaakkugira Aruvaruppaik Kuriththuth Dhaaniyel Theerkkadharisi Solliyirukkiraane; Vaasikkiravan Sindhikkakkadavan; Adhu Nirkath Thagaadha Idaththile Neengal Adhai Nirkak Kaanumpodhu, Yoodheyaavil Irukkiravargal Malaigalukku Odippogakkadavargal.
15 veettinmel Irukkiravan Than Veettukkul Irangaamalum, Than Veettil Edhaiyaagilum Eduththukkolla Ulle Pogaamalum Irukkakkadavan.
16 vayalil Irukkiravan Than Vasthiraththai Eduppadharkup Pinnittuth Thirumbaadhirukkakkadavan.
17 annaatkalile Karppavadhigalukkum Paalkodukkiravargalukkum Aiyo!
18 neengal Odippovadhu Maarikaalaththile, Sambaviyaadhapadikku Vendikkollungal.
19 enenil, Dhevan Ulagaththaich Sirushtiththadhumudhal Idhuvaraikkum Sambaviththiraadhadhum, Inimelum Sambaviyaadhadhumaana Migundha Ubaththiravam Annaatkalil Undaayirukkum.
20 karththar Annaatkalaik Kuraiththiraavittaal, Oruvanaagilum Thappippovadhillai; Thaam Therindhukondavargalinimiththamo, Avar Andha Naatkalaik Kuraiththirukkiraar.
21 appozhudhu: Idho, Kiristhu Inge Irukkiraar, Adho, Ange Irukkiraar Endru Evanaagilum Sonnaal, Nambaadheyungal.
22 enenil, Kallakkiristhukkalum Kallaththeerkkadharisigalum Ezhumbi, Koodumaanaal Therindhukollappattavargalaiyum Vanjikkaththakkadhaaga Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Seyvaargal.
23 neengalo Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Idho, Ellaavatraiyum Munnadhaaga Ungalukku Ariviththirukkiren.
24 annaatkalile, Andha Ubaththiravaththirkuppinbu, Sooriyan Andhagaarappadum, Sandhiran Oliyaikkodaadhirukkum;
25 vaanaththin Natchaththirangal Vizhum, Vaanangalilulla Saththuvangalum Asaikkappadum.
26 appozhudhu Manushakumaaran Migundha Vallamaiyodum Magimaiyodum Megangalinmel Varugiradhaik Kaanbaargal.
27 appozhudhu Avar Thammudaiya Thoodharai Anuppi, Thaam Therindhukondavargalai Boomiyin Kadaimunai Mudharkondu Vaanaththin Kadaimunaimattumulla Naaluthisaigalilumirundhu Koottichcherppaar.
28 aththimaraththinaal Oru Uvamaiyaik Katrukkollungal; Adhile Ilankilai Thondri, Thulirvidumpodhu, Vasandhakaalam Sameebamaayitru Endru Ariveergal.
29 appadiye Ivaigal Sambavikkiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Avar Sameebamaai Vaasalaruge Vandhirukkiraar Endru Ariyungal.
30 ivaigalellaam Sambavikkum Munne Indha Sandhadhi Ozhindhupogaadhendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
31 vaanamum Boomiyum Ozhindhupom, En Vaarththaigalo Ozhindhupovadhillai.
32 andha Naalaiyum Andha Naazhigaiyaiyum Pidhaa Oruvar Thavira Matroruvanum Ariyaan, Paralogaththilulla Thoodhargalum Ariyaargal, Kumaaranum Ariyaar.
33 akkaalaththai Neengal Ariyaadhapadiyaal Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Vizhiththirundhu Jebampannungal.

34 orumanushan Than Veettaivittu, Puradhesaththukkuppoga Eththanikkumpodhu, Than Oozhiyakkaararukku Adhigaarankoduththu, Avanavanukkuth Than Than Velaiyaiyum Niyamiththu, Vizhiththirukkumpadikkuk Kaavalkaaranukkuk Karpippaan.
35 appadiye Neengalum Vizhiththirungal; Enenil, Veettejamaan, Saayangaalaththilo, Naduraaththiriyilo, Seval Koovum Neraththilo, Kaalaiyilo, Eppozhudhu Varuvaan Endru Neengal Ariyeergal.
36 neengal Ninaiyaadha Velaiyil Avan Vandhu, Ungalaith Thoongugiravargalaagak Kandupidiyaadhapadikku Vizhiththirungal.
37 naan Ungalukku Sollugiradhai Ellaarukkum Sollugiren, Vizhiththirungal Endraar.
